comment.text: Inhibits estrogen-induced cell proliferation by competing with PLCG for binding to ESR1, blocking the effect of estrogen on PLCG and repressing estrogen-induced proliferation. May play a role in T-cell development and function.
Ubiquitously expressed. Aberrantly expressed in some cancers.

property.value: Expressed in oviduct epithelium and 203 other tissues
